summary: Feature request to simplify the API on interceptors in the TypeScript SDK. The specific details are marked as TBD, with the intent to be covered by a related feature request.
userImpact: Users working with interceptors could benefit from a simpler, more intuitive API design.
resolutionDetails: The intent behind this feature request was covered by issue #1764.
keyQuote: The intent behind this feature request will be covered by #1764.
